Vincenzo Gioacchino Pecci (later Pope Leo XIII) (1843.01.27 – 1846.01.19)

Edoardo Carlo Gastone Pöttickh de Pettenegg
Luigi Pellizzo (1923.03.24 – 1936.08.14)Demoted in 1925 as Titular bishopric
